name: Still Here - Singleplayer
description:
Still Here is an indie game of suspense, drama, platform and puzzle.

Your girlfriend dies and you had no chance to say how much you liked her. You are a character who is depressed due to the death of his girlfriend. Unfortunately, you die after an accident. Throughout the levels, you will find puzzles (find the 3 magic cubes that are situated in the scenario where you died) and some platforms (Levels and symbolic objects).

Make sure to extract the game folder on main disk where is your windows system installed.
